text: aur kuphfaar ye bhee kahate hain ki jo bachcha (vakt zabaah) un jaanavaron ke pet mein hai (jinhen hamane buton ke naam kar chhoda aur zinda paida hota to) sirph hamaare mardon ke lie halaal hai aur hamaaree auraton par haraam hai aur agar vah mara hua ho to sab ke sab usamen shareek hain khuda anaqareeb unako baaten banaane kee saza dega beshak vah hikamat vaala bada vaaqiphakaar hai
